# RTransposer

Transfer data from a set of *data.table R-objects* to a longitudinal biographical database according to the rules of the *Intermediate Data Structure* (IDS) ([Alter and Mandemakers, 2014](https://ehps-net.eu/article/intermediate-data-structure-ids-longitudinal-historical-microdata-version-4))
